data: {"generalSituation":"The weather will be mainly fine over Guangdong tomorrow. It will be warm during the day. An easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong gradually on New Year's Eve. It will become cloudier over the region. A cold front is expected to reach the coastal areas of southern China later on New Year's Day. Under the influence of the associated winter monsoon, winds will strengthen from the north over the region. Temperatures will fall appreciably and it will become cold on the day following New Year's Day and during the weekend. The weather will improve gradually. Under the persistent influence of the monsoon, the weather will be fine and dry early next week. It will remain rather cool in the morning. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251230","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2, east force 3 later.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine. Cool in the morning with relatively low visibility in some areas.
